attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Maya Ashton,Matilda Squires and Rose Arldige aged 9 are very annoyed and upset about the destruction of the rainforest and want to let people know that it is disappearing rapidly.We want to make a green and peaceful future. I KNOW WE ARE YOUNG BUT WE ARE READY TO SAVE THE WORLD ARE YOU?

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.  You are welcome to resubmit your petition with a title that fits the description above.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
